snippet.title: Tanuki Justice Trailer -  Nintendo Switch | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
⛩️🦝🦝⛩️Tanuki Justice is a continuous intensive action run'n gun in which you incarnate a tanuki brother and sister. You'll face hundreds of enemies in feudal Japan. Varied environments with landscapes of all kinds, retro and fast rhythmic music, numerous and difficult situations reminiscent of good old arcade games. A gameplay both simple and rich allowing spectacular actions. Possibility to play with 2 people for even more fun. And challenges that will challenge even the most skilled players. Time will be your worst enemy.⛩️🦝🦝⛩️

The game is available since 26 February 2021.

Tanuki Justice Switch (PEGI 7).
💳PHYSICAL VERSION Available here:
➡️Standard Edition: https://bit.ly/2C87aPY
____________
